overview: Khalid (Ramadan Booth) returns home after a long trip and find his girlfriend Deeja (Nafisa Abdullahi) missing in a brothel where she is in the custody of Magajiya (Fatima Isa Makamashi), he violently begins a quest for her whereabout which leads him to the home of an influential man Alh Kabir (Ali Nuhu). His curiousness and edgy nature lead to a journey that makes him discover some events that left him shocked
title: Kamanni
